English: TYNWALD COURT
ST JOHN’S 5th July, 1917.
ABSTRACTS
OF
ACTS FOR PROMULGATION
Printed by Authority by Brown & Sons, Limited, “Times” Buildings, Douglas.
ABSTRACTS OF ACTS OF TYNWALD
1.—THE INQUESTS OF DEATH AMENDMENT ACT, 1916.
Manx: YN SLATTYS BINGYN-VAASE (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHEY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to empower the Lieutenant-Governor to appoint a person to act as Coroner to conduct an inquest of death.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n Kiannoort yn Ellan dy churmaghey peccagh dy chummal bing-vaase ayns ynnyd Toshiaght-yoarrey.

English: The Royal Assent to the foregoing Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court of Buckingham Palace on the 16th day of November, 1916.
Manx: VA’N choardail Reeoil currit gys y Slattys shoh liorish E Ard ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec yn Plaase Buckingham er yn shey-jeigoo laa jeh’n vee Houney nuy cheead yeig as shey-jeig.

English: 2.—THE HIGHWAYS AMENDMENT ACT, 1916.
Manx: YN SLATTYS RAADYN MOOAREY (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHEY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to suspend the provisions of the Highway Ac, 1889, with respect to the communtation of rates of labour.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur-ass son traa ny kiarailyn jeh’n Slattys Raadyn Mooarey Hoght cheead yeig kiare-feed as nuy bentyn rish caghlaa keeshyn son obbyr.

English: The Royal Assent to the foregoing Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court of Buckingham Palace on the 23rd day of November, 1916.
Manx: VA’N choardail Reeoil currit gys y Slattys shoh liorish E Ard ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec yn Plaase Buckingham er yn threeoo laa as feed jeh’n Touin nuy cheead yeig as shey-jeig.

English: 3.—THE TURBARIES ACT, 1916.
Manx: YN SLATTYS MOANEEYN NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHEY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to empower the Common Lands Board to permit the cutting of turf from the 1st May to the 15th July in each year.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dychur pooar da’n Voayrd Thalloo y Theay dy chur kied da sleih giarey moain veih’n chied laa Voaldyn gys yn queig-yeigoo laa jeh’n chiaghtoo vee ayns dagh vlein.

English: The Royal Assent to the foregoing Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court of Buckingham Palace on the 5th day of December, 1916.
Manx: VA’N choardail Reeoil currit gys y Slattys shoh liorish E Ard ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec yn Plaase Buckingham er yn queigoo laa jeh’n ghaa-yeigoo vee nuy cheead yeig as shey-jeig.

English: 4.—THE SEA GULL PRESERVATION ACT AMENDMENT ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS FENDEILYS FOILLANYN  (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to empower the Lieutenant-Governor, by proclamattion, to suspend the provisions of the Sea Gull Preservation Act, 1867.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n Kiannoort yn Ellan liorish sarey dy chur-ass son traa ny kiarailyn jeh’n Slattys fendeilys foillanyn Hoght cheead yeig three feed as shiaght.

English: The Royal Assent to the foregoing Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court of Buckingham Palace on the 2nd day of May, 1917.
Manx: VA’N choardail Reeoil currit gys y Slattys shoh liorish E Ard ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec yn Plaase Buckingham er yn nah laa Voaldyn nuy cheead yeig as shiaght-jeig.

English: 5.—THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT (EXTERMINATION OF RATS) ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS GURNEILYS YNNYDAGH (CUR_MOW RODDANYN) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to provide for the extermination of rats.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail son cur mow roddanyn.

English: 6.—THE ADVERTISING RATE ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS KEESH DY HOILSHAGHEY YN ELLAN NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to increase the number of members of the Board of Advertising.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo ny smoo yn earroo jeh’n Voayrd-Soilshagh.

English: 7.—THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CONSOLIDATION ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS GURNEILYS YNNYDAGH (UNNANEYSAGH) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to consolidate the Local Government Acts.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy unnaneysey ny Slattysyn Gurneilys Ynnydagh.

English: 8.—THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS CAGLEEYS (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to exclude the period from the 3rd of August, 1914, to one year after the termination of the War from the period of six years within which a suit mayy be brought.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy ghoaill-ass yn traa voish yn trass laa jeh’n hoghtoo vee nuy cheead yeig as kiare-jeig gys un vlein lurg jerrey’ chaggey voish yn traa jeh shey bleeaney ayndoo te lowit dy chur-lesh cooishyn ayns quaiyl.

English: 9.—THE LORDS’ RENTS PURCHASE (AMENDMENT) ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS CHIONNAGHEY YN MAYLL CHIARN (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to authorize the Board to borrow money at a rate of interest not exceeding five per cent per annum.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n Voayrd dy yeeasaghey argid er use gyn ny smoo na queig puint ass y cheead s’y vlein.

English: 10.—THE HOUSE OF KEYS ELECTION AMENDMENT ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS REIH YN KIARE AS FEED (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the House of Keys Election Acts with respect to members accepting offices of profit.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo ny share ny lattysyn Reih yn Kiare as Feed as ta bentyn rish fer jeu goaill oikyn cosnee.

English: 11.—THE AGRICULTURAL AND RURAL INDUSTRIES AMENDMENT ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS EIRINYS AS GREASYN-CHEEREY (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the Agricultural and Rural Industries Act, 1917 [sic].
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo ny share yn Slattys eirinys as greasyn-cheerey nuy cheead yeig as kiare-jeig.

English: 12.—THE LAND DRAINAGE  AMENDMENT ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS SORNAL THALLOO NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the land Drainage Acts with respect to the formation of drainage districts.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo ny share ny Lattysyn Sornal Thalloo bentyn rish jannoo buill er-lheh son sornal.

English: 13.—THE CRUELTY TO ANIMALS ACT, 1917.
Manx: YN SLATTYS TORCHAGHEY CRETOORYN NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS SHIAGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to empower a High-Bailiff, or not less than two Justices of the Peace, to commit an offender to gaol, instead of imposing a pecuniary penalty.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n Ard-Vaylee as gyn ny sloo na jees Briwnyn-y-Chee dy chur s’y phrysoon kimmagh ayns ynnyd cur fo ooley.

English: The Royal Assent to the nine last preceeding Acts was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at Buckingham Palace on the 28th day of June, 1917.
Manx: VA’N choardail Reeoil currit gys y Slattys shoh liorish E Ard ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec yn Plaase Buckingham er yn noght as feedoo laa jeh’n cheyoo vee nuy cheead yeig as shiaght-jeig.
